test_single.description: Test model for single ionization mode - used for unit testing and validation

test_dual.description: Test model for dual ionization mode - used for unit testing and validation

DualModeMSNet.description: Production model for dual-mode MS spectra

TopIntensityMSNet_merged.description: Production model for single ionization mode, trained on both positive and negative ionization spectra

TopIntensityMSNet_positive.description: Specialized model for positive ionization mode spectra

TopIntensityMSNet_negative.description: Specialized model for negative ionization mode spectra

MultiHeaded_X_attention.description: Dual-mode model with multi-headed cross-attention module (best performance)

InterleavedEmbeddings.description: Dual-mode model with balancing complexity and good performance
